Fund Deposit Officer Job at D-Arsh Capital Limited




        
    

        
        D-Arsh Capital Limited is a non-interest financial institution in Nigeria and is poised to provide ethical services to individuals, corporations, and government entities.

As a non-interest Consumer Lending and Finance Services since its advent operation, the organization has maintained its leadership role by deepening this alternative model of financing. This has laid the foundation for providing the needed ethical funding for individuals, businesses and government in the areas of projects, trade finance, general finances and infrastructural development in the country.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Fund Deposit Officer
Job Location: Lekki-Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	To mobilize fund deposit for the company
	To increase customers database of the company's customer database
	To report daily sales to the line manager
	To maintain new customers and retain existing ones.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND, NCE, or OND qualification with 1 - 3 years of experience, and the candidate must reside in Lagos (preferably Island) and lives on Lekki, VI Sangotedo and Ogombo.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: d-arshcapital.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Candidate must reside in Lagos (preferably Island) and lives on Lekki, V,I Sangotedo and Ogombo
	Must experience in Financial institutions such as. Banks, Microfinance and finance company.

title: Job Vacancies at Credible Eye Care
content:
Credible Eye Care is a high-tech specialist Eye Care facility aimed at providing professional, exceptional and excellent eye care services. At Credible Eye Care, our vision is to provide optimal visual health and wellness. We have a team of well-trained, qualified, experienced and effective consulting ophthalmologist and optometrists.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Front Desk / Customer Service Officer

Job Location: Ikorodu (Ebute), Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time 

Job Description
     

            
    




	Attending to customers in a polite and professional manner
	Responding to phone calls
	Keeping record of sales
	Addressing all complaints from customers
	Sending appointment reminders


Requirements
Skills:


	Proactive
	Multitask
	Good communication.


Salary
N120,000 - N140,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: credibleeyecarejobopening@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Applicants must be ready to resume immediately and must reside within/near the company's location.

 

 

2.) Janitor 

Job Location: Ago, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Daily cleaning of office space
	Cleaning of tables and chairs
	Office errands


Requirements


	Must be neat and diligent.


Salary
N40,000 - N55,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: credibleeyecarejobopening@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Applicants must be ready to resume immediately and must reside within/near the company's location.

 

 

3.) Marketer

Job Location: Ejigbo,  Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Marketing to potential companies for partnership
	Visit to the hospital and the Pharmacy


Requirements


	Excellent communication skills
	Must be proactive and be able to multitask
	Must be ready to work.


Salary
N130,000 - N145,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: credibleeyecarejobopening@gmail.com using "MARKETING EJIGBO" as the subject of the mail.
